title: Effective Separating of Metal Impurities from Gypsum Nanosludge: Synergism of Mechanical Force and Metal Species Regulation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00799A, Paper
Changzhou Weng, Zhengqiang Zheng, Tian Chen, Zhang Lin
The effective separation of metal impurities from gypsum sludges is crucial for both environmental protection and resource recovery. However, it is seriously limited by their entrapment within calcium sulfate crystal...
